name: Down The Abyss (NeoAvantis, SemayI, WilliamLav, Dratsok, Vegia, Faustine Aragnou, Léopold Walho, NotTorn)
name_original: Down The Abyss (NeoAvantis, SemayI, WilliamLav, Dratsok, Vegia, Faustine Aragnou, Léopold Walho, NotTorn)
description:
INTRODUCTION

You're a damned soul diving deeper and deeper into the abyss.  Make your way through the different rooms, and fight all those who will dare to stand before you.

You can fight with three weapons, and each of them have different range and utility depending on the situation, it's up to you to fight through all the rooms and survive..

Meet Two unique Bosses,

And get the best high score by going deeper in the tower !

CONTROL

Direction : Swipe in the direction you want

Attack : push the mid button + Swipe in the direction you want

TEAM

This game was made for our 2nd year at the IIM digital school, we are a group of 9 people.

Game designer : 

Antoine Pinson, Hugo Costard, Mathis Pham

Game Art : 

Faustine Aragnou, Léopold Walho

Game programmer : 

Matthieu Cogez, Maxence Dupin, Thomas Kang

Game Producer :

William Lavergne
